title:
======================
Professor Rag's Lab Cleanup
======================
description:
Professor Rag, the brilliant but absent-minded
scientist, has done it again.
In his quest for groundbreaking discoveries, he's turned his 
lab into a chaotic mess of experiments, gadgets, and mysterious contraptions.
Now, he needs your help to restore order!
gameplay:
Dive into this exciting Sokoban-style puzzle game where you guide
Professor Rag through a maze of cluttered rooms. 
Push and maneuver objects to their rightful places, 
solving intricate puzzles along the way.
Each level presents new challenges and brain-teasing 
obstacles that will test your problem-solving skills.
callToAction:
Are you ready to help Professor Rag clean up his lab and bring back the brilliance? 
Put on your thinking cap and get ready for a thrilling adventure of logic and strategy! 
The lab awaits your expertise!
